title: What is the best fitness tracker to lose weight? - Quora

response.answer_text: The fitness tracker is the mirror in your house and the weighing scale. No other will even come close to the results that these things will show you. If these two things are showing the results you want, then take it that you are doing it right. If not, you have to change your strategy.
Why you need any tracker for this?? You just need to follow a quantified nutrition in deficits Calories along with good weight training. That's it.
